description: X marks the spot mateys! Turn the day into a fun filled pirate treasure romp
alt: Detailed pirate map leading to treasure

description: This legendary chasing game will have everyone laughing in excitement. Watch the goose give chase!
alt: Kids sitting in a circle on a field of grass playing a game of duck duck goose

description: Tackling at home or in the classroom probably isn't allowed. Paper football is a little less rambunctious but still carries all the fun!
alt: A finger holds down a paper football

description: If you want to tire your little one out there's no better option than an obstacle course constructed from simple things around the house!
alt: A little girl crawls around amongst a homemade obstacle course
